titleStmt.title: Description of Philosophical and kabbalistic writings.

notesStmt.note: Corrosive ink. Tidemarks, stains and losses at edges due to damp (repaired). Lacuna after folio 6.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Be᾿ur emtsa῾i ῾al Sefer ha-shema῾ ha-tiv῾i shel Aristo באור אמצעי על ספר השמע הטבעי של אריסטו

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi (North African) semi-cursive scripts of the 15th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Averroes. Commentary On Aristoteles Physica Auscultatio. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 5430.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Purchased by the British Museum from S. Raffalovich: inscribed, folio [164v] (fse001v).
